dashboardLayout.menuDescription: Main navigation links for the application.

login.subTagline: Join a community of modern farmers leveraging AI for better yields and sustainable practices.
login.createAccountPrompt: Create your account to get started.
login.signInPrompt: Welcome back! Sign in to your dashboard.

dashboard.description: Here's a quick overview of your farm and market.

cropDoctor.title: AI Crop Doctor
cropDoctor.description: Upload a clear image of an affected crop leaf to get an instant diagnosis and suggested solutions.

client.uploadDescription: Select a photo of the affected plant.
client.resultPlaceholder: Your diagnosis result will appear here.

marketAnalyst.title: Market Analyst
marketAnalyst.description: Get real-time market price analysis and recommendations. Ask a question like "What is the price of onions in Pune Mandi?"

faqs.q1: What kind of questions can I ask?
faqs.a1: You can ask about current crop prices in specific locations, price trends, and get recommendations on whether to sell or hold your produce. For example: 'What is the price of tomatoes in Pune?' or 'Should I sell my wheat stock now?'
faqs.q2: How accurate is the price information?
faqs.a2: The price information is based on real-time data from various agricultural markets (mandis). While we strive for accuracy, prices can fluctuate rapidly. Use the information as a guide for your decisions.
faqs.q3: Can I ask about future price predictions?
faqs.a3: Yes, you can ask for price trend analysis and predictions. The AI will provide insights based on historical data and current market conditions, but please note that these are forecasts and not guarantees.
faqs.q4: What locations and crops are supported?
faqs.a4: The assistant covers a wide range of major crops and markets across India. You can ask about vegetables, grains, fruits, and more in various cities and their main agricultural markets.

client.placeholder: e.g., What are the chances of tomato prices increasing in the next week in Bangalore? Or click the mic to speak.
client.resultPlaceholder: Your market analysis will appear here.

schemes.title: Scheme & Information Hub
schemes.description: Discover key government schemes, stay updated with the latest news, and find information tailored for you.

pmkisan.title: PM-KISAN Scheme
pmkisan.description: Financial support of â‚¹6,000 per year for small and marginal farmer families.

pmfby.title: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana
pmfby.description: Insurance coverage against crop failure due to natural calamities, pests or diseases.

kcc.title: Kisan Credit Card (KCC)
kcc.description: Provides farmers with timely access to credit for their cultivation and other needs.

kharifMsp.title: Government increases MSP for Kharif crops
kharifMsp.description: The Cabinet has approved a significant hike in the Minimum Support Price for all mandated Kharif crops for the upcoming marketing season.

subsidyPortal.title: New portal launched for farm subsidy disbursal
subsidyPortal.description: A new unified portal has been launched to streamline the process of subsidy application and disbursal for various farming equipment.

horticultureMission.title: Guidelines issued for National Horticulture Mission
horticultureMission.description: The Department of Agriculture has released updated guidelines for the NHM to boost the horticulture sector, with a focus on post-harvest management.

enamMilestone.title: e-NAM reaches new milestone with 1,000 mandis integrated
enamMilestone.description: The electronic National Agriculture Market (e-NAM) platform has now connected over 1,000 agricultural produce markets across the country.

solarPump.title: Solar pump scheme extended for another year
solarPump.description: The PM-KUSUM scheme, aimed at providing solar-powered irrigation pumps to farmers, has been extended until March 2025.

client.title: Find a Specific Scheme
client.description: Use our AI assistant to get details on any government scheme by asking a question.
client.placeholder: e.g., Tell me about PM-KISAN scheme
client.resultPlaceholder: Ask a question to see scheme details here.

weather.title: Live Weather Forecast
weather.noData: No weather data available. Please try a different location.

community.title: Community Forum
community.description: Connect with other farmers, share knowledge, and grow together.

general.0: Has anyone tried the new organic fertilizer? Seeing good results here.
general.1: Yes, I have! My tomato yield has increased by almost 15%.
general.2: That's great to hear! I was thinking of buying it. Is it good for leafy greens?
general.3: Absolutely! My spinach has never been healthier.

tomato.0: My tomato plants are showing some yellow leaves. Any advice?
tomato.1: Could be a nitrogen deficiency. Have you tested your soil recently?

pest.0: Whiteflies are a major issue in my cotton crop. What's the best way to handle them?

organic.0: I'm looking for good organic composting techniques. Any resources?
organic.1: The E-Learning Hub has some great articles on vermicomposting!

market.0: Onion prices in Pune seem to be dropping. Should I sell now or wait?

shop.title: Krishi Store
shop.description: Choose where you want to buy your farming supplies from.
shop.govStoreDescription: Purchase subsidized seeds, fertilizers, and equipment directly from government-approved outlets. Ensures quality and fair pricing.
shop.privateMarketplaceDescription: Browse a wide variety of products from different sellers. Find competitive prices and a larger selection of brands and items.

government.title: Government Portal
government.embedNote: Note: Some government websites may not work correctly when embedded. If you experience issues, please use the "Open in New Tab" button.

marketplace.title: Private Marketplace
marketplace.description: Quality products for all your farming needs from various sellers.
marketplace.comingSoonMessage: We couldn't find a product matching '{{query}}'. We are constantly expanding our inventory, so please check back later!

learn.title: E-Learning Hub
learn.description: Expand your knowledge with our collection of farming guides and tutorials.
learn.searchPlaceholder: Search for articles, videos, or products...
learn.irrelevantTopicMessage: Your search for "{{query}}" seems to be unrelated to agriculture. Please try a different search term.
learn.noVideosFoundMessage: Your search for "{{query}}" did not return any videos. Please try a different search term.
learn.noArticlesFound: No Matching Guides or Web Results
learn.noArticlesFoundMessage: Your search for "{{query}}" did not match any of our guides or find any articles on the web. Please try a different search term.

dripIrrigation.title: Mastering Drip Irrigation
dripIrrigation.description: A comprehensive guide to setting up and maintaining drip irrigation systems for maximizing water efficiency and boosting crop yields. Covers component selection, layout planning, and troubleshooting common issues.

ipm.title: Integrated Pest Management (IPM)
ipm.description: Explore sustainable, eco-friendly strategies to manage pests. This guide covers biological controls, cultural practices, and the targeted use of pesticides to protect your crops and the environment.

soilHealth.title: Soil Health and Nutrition
soilHealth.description: Unlock the secrets to rich, fertile soil. This article delves into the fundamentals of soil science, including composition, pH balance, and how to enrich your soil for healthier, more productive plants.

composting.title: Advanced Composting Techniques
composting.description: Learn to transform farm waste into 'black gold'. This guide details various composting methods, including hot and cold composting, vermicomposting, and how to create balanced compost piles.

cropRotation.title: Understanding Crop Rotation
cropRotation.description: Discover the benefits of strategic crop rotation, including improved soil fertility, pest and disease cycle disruption, and increased biodiversity. Includes sample rotation plans for common crops.

organicFarming.title: Basics of Organic Farming
organicFarming.description: An essential introduction to the core principles and practices of organic agriculture. Covers certification, natural fertilization, weed control, and marketing organic produce for sustainable farming.

profile.title: Farmer Profile
profile.description: Manage your personal information and preferences.
profile.cardDescription: Keep your details up to date to receive personalized recommendations.
profile.myCropsDescription: Add crops you cultivate to get relevant alerts and advice (comma-separated).
